main.name: Christopher Ray Manurung
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I'm a Front End Developer with expertise in building modern web applications using React.js and TypeScript. Currently working at PT United Tractors, I specialize in developing enterprise-level systems with focus on user experience and responsive design. I have hands-on experience in implementing real-time tracking features and working with complex data management in Agile environments. My technical stack includes React.js, TypeScript, TanStack Table, and Zustand for state management. I'm passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications that solve real business problems.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a business partner!

education.school: Raja Ali Haji Maritime University - Tanjungpinang

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Designed and developed a web-based system for heavy equipment service management using React.js, TypeScript, and modern state management. Implemented responsive features and real-time tracking in an Agile team environment

testimonials.text: Chris is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Chris has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
